name: Hammer Keep
description:
( WEBGL may be slow, pls try windows version if possible )

A Hack-and-Smash where your weapons is unstable

Controls : 

Movement = Arrow keys / WASD / ZQSD

Smash = C / K

Dodge = X / L

Please check the in-game " how to play " before playing the game
